Title: Establishes a pilot program for peace/conflict resolution centers; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes a pilot program for peace/conflict resolution centers; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add Art 25 ยง1220, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a pilot program for peace/conflict resolution centers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
